messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] why I overreacted.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/17/02 11:04:30 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Tia, Thanks for your suggestion.  I m not quite ready for that at this point, but I will let
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/17/02 11:04:30 PM Central Daylight Time,
leschke@... writes:


> Athena, would it help to have contact with a woman who has had a brain
> tumor three times and is coping very well and feeling positive? I have no
> idea whether she has email, but if you're interested, I could ask her. I
> don't know where you are, so I don't know if phone contact is feasible.
>

Tia,
Thanks for your suggestion. I'm not quite ready for that at this point, but
I will let you know if/when it seems like it would be helpful. What a great
idea, and how kind of you to think of it for me! Right now I just need to be
still and try to absorb the blow this has been. Thank you.
Athena


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] why I overreacted.
messages.msgSnippet: ... Athena, would it help to have contact with a woman who has had a brain tumor three times and is coping very well and feeling positive?  I have no idea
messages.messageBody:
>Hello,
>I'm sorry for overreacting to what was really no big deal. My coping skills
>pretty much flew out the window yesterday when I learned that my brain tumor
>has come back. I know that's no excuse to be rude. I guess I am just shaken
>up a bit more than I realized. I don't know what the future holds. Please
>accept my apology.

Athena, would it help to have contact with a woman who has had a brain
tumor three times and is coping very well and feeling positive? I have no
idea whether she has email, but if you're interested, I could ask her. I
don't know where you are, so I don't know if phone contact is feasible.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] why I overreacted.
messages.msgSnippet: Best wishes and prayers your way, Athena. Take care of yourself! ... From: bunuz7@aol.com [mailto:bunuz7@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 17, 2002 5:27 PM To:
messages.messageBody:
Best wishes and prayers your way, Athena. Take care of yourself!

-----Original Message-----
From: bunuz7@... [mailto:bunuz7@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 17, 2002 5:27 PM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] why I overreacted.


Hello,
I'm sorry for overreacting to what was really no big deal. My coping skills
pretty much flew out the window yesterday when I learned that my brain tumor
has come back. I know that's no excuse to be rude. I guess I am just
shaken
up a bit more than I realized. I don't know what the future holds. Please
accept my apology.

Athena


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Hello,
I'm sorry for overreacting to what was really no big deal. My coping skills
pretty much flew out the window yesterday when I learned that my brain tumor
has come back. I know that's no excuse to be rude. I guess I am just shaken
up a bit more than I realized. I don't know what the future holds. Please
accept my apology.

Athena
